thread.title: BRIEF-Lanhai Medical Investment Expects Net Loss To Widen To 670-720 Million Yuan In 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lanhai Medical Investment Expects Net Loss To Widen To 670-720 Million Yuan In 2017

organizations.name: reuters) - lanhai medical investment co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Lanhai Medical Investment Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS NET LOSS TO WIDEN TO 670-720 MILLION YUAN ($105.96-113.87 million) IN 2017 FROM 459.4 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2nqhNmL Further company coverage:
$1 = 6.3230 Chinese yuan renminbi Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom
